elements.name: applicantName
elements.title: Who is applying to represent  and manage {deceasedName}'s property, money and belongings?
elements.description:
Here is a list of the people you have identified so far in this service.

If you have already included yourself in previous steps, you will still need to identify if you are applying for a `Representation Grant` for {deceasedName} in this step.

elements.name: applicantFAQ1
elements.title: Can more than 1 person apply to represent {deceasedName}?
elements.body:
Yes, normally, more can 1 person can apply together to represent {deceasedName}.

Multiple `personal representatives` can help share the workload but it may also require a lot of scheduling time together.

Some organizations may require all of {deceasedName}'s personal representatives to meet in-person and sign documents at the same time.

However, if 2 or more people want to apply together, this service cannot help you at this time. For now, this service has only been developed for a limited number of situations.

Please check later to see if this service has been developed for your specific situation. This service is continuously expanding to help more and more people.

In the mean time, the Government of British Columbia offers PDF forms that you may find helpful for your application. Click here to go to the forms. (This link opens in a new tab)
